test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_by_nonce
test_vectors.description: Transactions from same sender ordered by nonce

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_by_fee
test_vectors.description: Transactions from different senders ordered by fee (highest first)

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_nonce_gap_deferred
test_vectors.description: Transaction with nonce gap is deferred in mempool

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_insufficient_balance
test_vectors.description: Transaction with insufficient balance for fee+amount is skipped

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_block_size_limit
test_vectors.description: Block size limit respected in transaction ordering

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_fee_replacement
test_vectors.description: Transaction with same nonce but higher fee replaces in mempool

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_fee_too_low_rejected
test_vectors.description: Replacement transaction with lower/equal fee is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_already_in_blockchain
test_vectors.description: Transaction already executed in blockchain is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_energy_vs_fee
test_vectors.description: Transaction can use energy instead of fee

test_vectors.name: consensus_tx_ordering_multisig_fee
test_vectors.description: Multisig transactions include additional signature fees
